1. Introduction to Python

What is Python?

High-level, interpreted, general-purpose language. Great for beginners due to its readability.

Why Learn Python?

Used in web development, data science, AI, automation, and more.

How to Install Python:

  • Download from python.org
  • Use IDLE, VS Code, or Jupyter Notebooks

Hello World Example:

print("Hello, World!")
